name: Contract Modeling Language
short_description: This project consolidates 8 years of research on abstract specification of business contracts, mainly in the financial instruments area. The syntax of ContractML is defined in XML-Schema and MOF/UML, using EMF to implement/generate the API and GUI. We ar
